chat.ejb.service

Interface ChatRoomService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChatRoomServiceImpl

    public interface ChatRoomService
    This chat room service interface provides the functionality for managing chat room data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Conversation> findUserConversations(java.lang.String username)
      This method queries the database to find all conversations associated with the given username.
      java.util.List<Message> getAllConversationMessages(java.util.Date day, java.lang.String roomName, ChatRoomUser user)
      This method finds and returns all messages in a conversation associated with the given day and room name.
      ChatRoom getChatRoom(java.lang.String roomName, ChatRoomUser user)
      This method returns a ChatRoom object with the given name.
      void storeMessage(Message message)
      This method saves a message to the database.

    • Method Detail

      • getChatRoom

        ChatRoom getChatRoom(java.lang.String roomName,
                     ChatRoomUser user)
        This method returns a ChatRoom object with the given name.
        Parameters:
        roomName - the chat room name
        user - the chat room user
        Returns:
        the ChatRoom object

      • storeMessage

        void storeMessage(Message message)
        This method saves a message to the database.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to save

      • findUserConversations

        java.util.List<Conversation> findUserConversations(java.lang.String username)
        This method queries the database to find all conversations associated with the given username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        Returns:
        the list of conversations

      • getAllConversationMessages

        java.util.List<Message> getAllConversationMessages(java.util.Date day,
                                                   java.lang.String roomName,
                                                   ChatRoomUser user)
        This method finds and returns all messages in a conversation associated with the given day and room name.
        Parameters:
        day - the day
        roomName - the room name
        user - the user
        Returns:
        the list of messages
